definitions: in a way that relates to sexual pleasure derived from watching others when they are naked or engaged in sexual activity

examples.text: he voyeuristically filmed their liaisons using a nighttime camera

shortDefinitions: in way that derives sexual pleasure from watching others naked or engaged in sexual activity

definitions: in a way that relates to enjoyment derived from seeing the pain or distress of others

examples.text: we hope to voyeuristically glimpse fright from a distance

shortDefinitions: in way that derives enjoyment from seeing pain or distress of others
